id.description: The unique identifier of the owner.

email.description: The email address of the owner.

firstName.description: The first name of the owner.

lastName.description: The last name of the owner.

userId.description: The user ID associated with the owner.

createdAt.description: The date and time the owner was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time the owner was last updated.

archived.description: Indicates if the owner is archived or not.

teams.description: A list of teams the owner belongs to.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team.

membership.description: The membership status of the owner within the team.
